title: Starry Rendezvous at the Celestial Pavilion
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), ultra detailed, 8k wallpaper, Donghua Chinese animation style, a stunning cinematic scene, 16:9 aspect ratio. An astronaut floating in zero gravity outside a hybrid space station. The astronaut wears a custom white and gold space suit overlaid with a majestic, flowing robe adorned with traditional Chinese Ruyi cloud patterns, facing the viewer. The space station module is architecturally designed like an ancient Chinese pavilion with a tiled roof and a large panoramic window. Inside the brightly lit window, five people dressed in elaborate traditional Hanfu robes look outward, smiling. The background is deep space filled with nebulae, distant planets, and a dense field of stars. Numerous glowing orange Chinese sky lanterns float dramatically across the void. Dynamic composition, vibrant colors, celestial atmosphere, fantasy sci-fi fusion.
